actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law

official_title: To make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.
short_title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007

summary.text: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007 - Amends the Internet Tax Freedom Act to make permanent the ban on state and local taxation of Internet access and on multiple or discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce.

titles.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2007
To make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.
